body.name: HP OfficeJet Pro 8139e All-in-One Printer, Color, Printer for Home, Print, Copy, scan, fax, Instant Ink Eligible; Automatic Document Feeder; Touchscreen; Quiet Mode; Print Over VPN
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 23 hrs 40 mins
features: FROM AMERICA'S MOST TRUSTED PRINTER BRAND – The OfficeJet Pro 8139e is perfect for home offices printing professional-quality color documents like business documents, reports, presentations and flyers. Print speeds up to 10 ppm color, 20 ppm black.
UPGRADED FEATURES – Fast color printing, scan, copy, fax, auto 2-sided printing, auto document feeder, and a 225-sheet input tray
WIRELESS PRINTING – Stay connected with our most reliable dual-band Wi-Fi, which automatically detects and resolves connection issues
HP APP – Print, scan, copy, or fax right from your smartphone with the easiest-to-use print app

1 YEAR OF PRINTING – Subscribe to Instant Ink delivery service to get ink delivered directly to your door before you run out. After 1 year, monthly fee applies unless cancelled, and you save up to 50%.
PROTECTS YOUR DATA – HP Wolf Essential Security bolsters security and helps keep your network protected from cyber threats
2.7-INCH TOUCHSCREEN – Quickly navigate your printer with a large color touchscreen and a phone-like user interface
SUSTAINABLE DESIGN – Made with more than 45% recycled plastic

This printer is intended to work only with cartridges with original HP chips or circuitry and will block cartridges using non-HP chips or circuitry. Periodic firmware updates will maintain the effectiveness of these measures.
body.description: The HP OfficeJet Pro 8139e delivers fast color printing, 225-sheet paper capacity, and scan, copy and fax capabilities. It includes wireless and printer security features to keep your multifunction printer up to date and secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well as an all-in-one
reviews.reviewText: We do very sporadic printing, sometimes just a few pages a month, but sometime hundreds of pages at once. The printer does a great job of printing and also copying and scanning. Installation and setup were relatively easy. We subscribe to the HP ink service which automatically monitors the printer status online and sends us new cartridges as needed. This is perfect for us since we never have to worry about ink drying out from disuse or running out under heavy use. We had an earlier model of this printer for a number of years that served us well until it started showing its age.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit for household needs
reviews.reviewText: good fit for our need. school works, family needs, kids coloring works great with auto refill from HP.So far so good. bought lower model few months back and had to return as scanner feeder stopped working and print also intermittently giving issues.This one works good so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adding printer ink is a bit confusing
reviews.reviewText: I think the printer works well. I was a bit confused about the ink cartridges as you have to unwrap and then snap off the handles before inserting them into the printer. the set up was easy as you go online to connect with HP. No problem. Fits nicely on the desk I assembled and the copy is good. I don't do a lot of copies but signed up for both ink and paper. Can cancel at any time. Cartridges are free for a period of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HP Great product
reviews.reviewText: this is my 2nd HPSmart. the first one lasted years until I bought a new laptop and the driver wouldn't update to manage all the features on the HP Smart app. I bought this one and very pleased with HP. Easy step by step installation with accurate instructions. You don't have to guess. Make sure that you read the operating system your printer support before you purchase. That can make a huge difference. The installation allowed me to use the replacement of the previous HP 3830 free plan with this one. I've faxed and printed so far. I will never by another brand of printers. I tried an Epson before I bought this one and quickly gave it away, and found this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WHAT EVER YOU DO, DON'T GO WITH HP
reviews.reviewText: Purchased HP OfficeJet Pro 8139e in order to print remote. Have always owned Canon but thought I would give HP a try. WRONG. I was unable to set the printer up on my own. Went to HP website and went through troubleshooting unsuccessfully. Called support line and of course on hold for over hour. Finally got with technician. She was helpful but had me unplugging all connections. Even computer to router. After several attempts, she finally took over my computer remotely and turned off all of my antivirus. Another hour or so and she finally said it would print from computer, but HP Smart would not work remotely while antivirus was on...who doesn't run antivirus these days??? Anyway, we gave up and I can only print from computer. Problem now is the Wi-Fi not working from computer, I assume from disconnecting all the wires. OMG. So, after printing a couple of documents, I find that print quality is POOR. I am trying now to reconnect by old printer and return this junk. Will NOT replace with HP this time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FAST, Quiet, Attractive, Easy-to-use/ set-up
reviews.reviewText: This printer is a win from HP. I have been an Instant Ink subscriber for well over 7 years now (with the same medium-use HP printer!) Because of a lightning strike/power outtage I kept getting a bad printhead warning on the screen and decided it was time for an upgrade. Found this one with the free year (and $100 off!) up to 700 pages/mo and thought that had to be for new subscribers only but it's not! After 7+ years I get a free year of ink! I subscribe to their paper as well so I synced that up for the year and I'm good to go. Before Instant Ink half the time I couldn't afford Ink in my printer, or would only buy black. I killed one printer I bought once with off-label ink- I still remember the awful noises it made. Then I discovered HP and Instant Ink. Now I print freely - all I want and they send me supplies as needed. Anyways- the printer. It took less than 3 minutes to set up with the on-screen guide the walks you through. You need your WiFi name and password and maybe a couple other simple pieces of information. The app on your phone (recommended) makes it easy to print from your Drive, etc. It has its own email address so you can send docs while you're away from home and they'll be waiting for you when you arrive (you can change the beginning to something simple to remember.) I struggle to set up printers on computers, etc but this one literally did it for itself. I almost expect it to have my coffee waiting for me one morning it's so intuitive, lol. You won't be disappointed with this printer! Give the Instant Ink a try while you're at it- you'll wonder how you ever lived without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for the price point
reviews.reviewText: Very good for the price point. The biggest plus is that it is not super tall and bulky like the other HP printers. More compact and doesn't take up a lot of space. Works 98 percent of the time for casual household printing needs. Finicky here and there but MUCH better than other HP printers. Colored screen is easier to read and can pivot. This is an honest review and I got nothing out of leaving this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made,cheap plastic.
reviews.reviewText: I replaced my older HP printer, which was well made. this one is made cheaply. I'm disappointed with the current quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great printer for the price point!
reviews.reviewText: Great printer. Sign up for the ink program. So worth it if you have students or run a small business.
The impersonal nature of on line purchases.

reviews.reviewTitle: That you can’t get the ink cartridges for this model !!!
reviews.reviewText: I just got my new Hp office jet Pro 8034e printer and was extremely happy with it until the original ink cartridges run out and now it’s impossible for me to get 910Xl 8034e I got 910 Xl 8035 hoping it will work but not it’s far from the original!I should have been told that I will not be able to get the same ink because the contrast between the original and what I can get it’s bad!Love ❤️ the printer but !!!!!!!Does anyone have suggestions! For me it’s important to get true colour in my prints!
